description.value: A set of codes that define a patients level of consciousness. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - 248234008 | Mentally alert | - 300202002 | Responds to voice | - 450847001 | Responds to pain | - 422768004 | Unresponsive | - 130987000 | Acute confusion |
